title: ---> [POLL] <--- Old Fiora v. New Fiora Visuals
body: Probably one of the most unnecessary "visual updates" they've ever done, IMO.

replies.body:
The people voting for the new one don't have a good view of it from those pictures. In-game it looks horrendous, easily noticeable when fully zoomed out. Here's some zoomed in pics:

http://media-titanium.cursecdn.com/attachments/67/663/fiorabasemv.jpg

http://media-titanium.cursecdn.com/attachments/67/664/fioranightravenmv.jpg

http://media-titanium.cursecdn.com/attachments/67/665/fioramusketeermv.jpg

http://media-titanium.cursecdn.com/attachments/67/666/fioraheadmistressmv.jpg

Whoever the artists behind this are, they need to be told very clearly that it's not okay by any stretch of the imagination.
The bodies are fine, the rapier handle is too big, and the face is just terrible, weird and cartoony. She looks surprised for some reason. Ugh.

[edited some off topic rude words]

Btw the handle of the sword/rapier is the size of her head... gj
I would prefer if the artists stick more to their original style and not adapt the trend of other games or at least make a public poll.
Agreed, there probably should be a public poll for these kinds of changes. It would be an interesting way to interact with the community at least.

I've seen tons of Rioters on these forums doing just that. In several threads whining about Fiora Stashu came to clarify things. Is that not interaction?

*Incoming butthurt, sorry i'm having a bad day*

Well if you wanna be technical, interaction is a two-way street, if Riot hears tons of complaints but doesn't do anything about it that's not really an interaction.

Not just unnecessary but out right bad, everything here isn't just a bad version of Fiora it's bad period, the Liefeldian Build and Pose, the bland background character like cloths, it's just out right bad.

Old Fiora splash art is one of my favorites, if not my favorite, splashes in the game. I already don't like the new splash (nothing can replace the perfection of that splash) and if they keep Fiora looking like some cartoon villian, I will never forgive.

_**"A Cartoon Villian"**_

That's the best description of that horrible Splashart I've read I think

Srsly the new Fiora base skin doesnt make sense. Why is she blue and white again? Why is she wearing a leotard, a corset and a Space Marine sized pauldron to battle? The old one has grace, style and practicality because it meshes light armor with her clothing like one single piece, now the rest of her body is skin tight while her shoulders stands out like a fucking Venus trap. Furthermore, the old armor is form fitting and sleek, it's armor, but it doesn't flare out but keep it reserved fitting for a stylish and gracious duelist. Now all of her new stuff has **FLARE EVERYWHERE** like come on guys no one needs clothing that big and flamboyant, certainly not one who talks about grace. The new base looks like a scrapped version of Order of the Lotus with the color scheme and the mega leaf shoulder thing, but it is definitely not Fiora

Ahahaha
Aaaa

She looks like fucking Michael Jackson after surgery number 45.

Oh my bad, thank you for correcting me!

Although really it does kinda look similar to "Michael's Throwback Surgery" (I think that was either number 75 or 82) where he reverted to a previous state of his plastic surgery history.
I just can't explain how bad the new Fiora looks, how blind Riot is, and how bad they fked up.

It's just sad, cause Fiora looks really cool in her Concept Art...

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Q50J2dYPUbY/Va6JPIeODNI/AAAAAAAAt7Q/8XI_MSB_Bq8/s1600/fu-banner.jpg

And then it's like something was literally _lost in translation_, cause the splash and ingame model look just really bad.
That aliasing on Nightraven... nice DS graphics Riot
I don't even like the concept art. It just seems so plain. There was nothing wrong with the old one. Literally no reason to change it
Why was her old splash better? New splash takes the old splash pose and window lighting and upgrades the art, adding in new details. I don't see how that's "plain".

> [{quoted}](name=TheFirstGokun,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QFTZsUJj,comment-id=001600000000,timestamp=2015-07-22T07:41:32.614+0000)

Well for one, new Fiora is apparently anorexic.

Not that this matters. Do you feel she needed a VU?
By far her live model looks 100x better. Although I love the new splash art I just can't with her face.. It's too, plastic-y.
Riot for the love of god ,Stop trying to fix whats not broken.

There is no reason to take a champion people identify with and CHANGE THEIR FACE. If they want to change her clothes because her old outfit made no sense, fine. Upgrade her model? Fine. They're an ugly abomination like old Sion? FINE! But Fiora did not need to be changed into a new person. The person that people identified with in different ways is being removed from the game and replaced with someone that looks nothing like her.
Oldschool Fiora is so much better.

http://i.imgur.com/oNQz27O.jpg[/img]

Riot fixed it there you all happy?
500+ votes, but they won't even read these posts

Didn't a Rioter recently say that her visual/art update would be small scale, even smaller than Miss Fortune's?  If so, it's clearly a blatant lie.

EDIT: Found it: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/hKbmq2Ta-meddler-said-fiora-is-getting-some-art-changes-a-long-with-her-update-she-keeps-her-hair-right?comment=000400020000
They changed the majestic looking Fiora into something that rivals Shrek in terms of attractiveness.

These kinds of "polls" are very confusing and misleading. WHAT about "old" and "new" Fiora are we comparing in terms of visuals? Their splash arts? Their designs? Their in-game models? Because honestly I have different opinions for all three of those things and this kind of thread just encourages a lot of unnecessary, misled, and overgeneralized hate.

Splash art - face looks too sharp and cartoony
Ingame model (face) - face is especially ugly, clothes and other stuff is o.k
Headmistress skin - again, ingame face kinda ruins the sexiness, also her boobs got smaller?
I hope this is some sort of April Fools stunt because this is an atrocity, literally worse than Hitler.

> [{quoted}](name=hoganftw,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QFTZsUJj,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-07-22T01:31:48.118+0000)
>
> literally worse than Hitler.

I hope you know what "literally" means, right?
The new Nightraven Fiora's face reminds me of blood and night elves from WoW
The splashart is a little intense, she looks like a chonga, but I realy like her in game? I think the large and gaudy matches her personality

I like the new model, but her face looks really bad. If they touched up her face and hair on the new model, it would be perfect in my opinion.

And fix her damn face in the new splash art!

The new splash is gorgeous. The new base skin needs less blue, but is also fantastic.

BUT NOW THE SKINS ARE HIDEOUS... D;

Okay, the changes to her face in her models are UNDERSTANDABLE except for her headmistress skin.. That "then/now" difference is almost inexcusable (unless riot was trying to get the update out fast and is planning to go back and touch things up.) Her new splash really isn't that bad, its good imo. What I hope is for Riot to use the same face the old Fiora had because she had one of the best faces in the game haha. 

Other than that STELLAR work on the update to her kit Riot :)
I think fioras new model needs the same color pallet as her old one but i still like the new model itself.. just not the colors so much :(

I actually like much more the composition of the new splash, and the concept art was sweet, but the face is awful. It does have a certain style and personality, but I don't dig it. The composition running around here with the old face looks much better (imho).

And the royal guard and headmistress models are awful. I do like parts of the normal and raven skins.

The composition is better on the new one.

But the anatomy is off, and the entire thing looks is lit and textured like rubber under a flashlight.  The face, is more caricaturized than a lot, but not really bad.  I can understand peoples complaints though, as it just really isn't an attractive face compared to the previous.  And as my old Artistic Anatomy professor said, there is no amount of composition that can make up for a bad drawing.  

Plus, does anyone else get a completely unfitting space cadet feel from her new outfit? It just really doesn't look like anything else in the game, like she's a port from another game, an alien, or a time traveler or something.  I had similar complaints with Ekko though, so maybe that ones just me.

EDIT: FOUND IT! I knew there was a specific scifi uniform it was reminding me of, just imagine [this](https://www.yourprops.com/movieprops/original/yp5201dcdc9379c1.62941349/Star-Trek-IV-The-Voyage-Home-Spock-Class-A-Maroon-Uniform-1.jpg) in white.

I really hate being one of those guys who complains about the visuals, but tbh i'm just confused here. Fiora's visual identity was fine, it was modern enough, no major thematic inconsistancies like Sejuani's Winter Bikini, and displayed her character to a Tee. I'm just not certain why they decided she needed a full on VU, when they could have cleaned up some of the original models and made her hair more natural.

As someone who has a great amount of respect for Fiora's identity, despite not being able to play her competently myself, I'm a little sad. I don't think her new visuals are crap mind you.....Save for one thing

PLEASE PEOPLE. STOP. MAKING. GIANT. SHOULDERPADS. Those are WAY TOO BIG.

To be absolutely honest with you guys here, If they gave her back her old hairstyle, and slimmed down her fucking shoulderpads from being made for Garen to being made for a fencer then I'd have little problem with it (Despite my absolute love for her original outfit, God i wish they still did Traditional skins).
my only complaint is headmistress fiora's skirt is not right enough as it is depicted in the splash art.
I like the new ones on all the skins except the last one. I don't know why, maybe its the new colors (on the base skin at least).
I cant help but feel the only reason is to make her easier to make skins for. But id rather no skins and keep the original. Unless the new skin hides her face lol

No idea why they invested time into doing a VU on a relatively modern champion anyways. I get the kit rework... but nobody was complaining about her visuals.

Mean while... {{champion:36}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

I LOVE the base splash clothing. I dislike the face in everything. Chin looks like that of a dude. A manly dude.

**FIORA'S CHIN RIVALS THAT OF {{champion:201}} IN MANLINESS**

The Royal Guard Fiora clothing sucks as well, but not all skins are created equally and that is just my preference.

So my vote was old fiora

personally I would prefer a middle ground. I like the new fiora's breastplate more than the old one, but I like the old ones cape better. I like how they removed the dagger because it was something that was never part of her gameplay. I like her new stance, but I miss her old armored pants. her old face was far better though.

Old. No question.

Let the royal guard have the new one's hat though.

I might be a sucker for that style of hat <.<
Went from the best looking female champion to one of the worst. Even this {{champion:28}} face is better.
